content.rendered:
At Print a Thing we’re working together to break down the barriers to 3D printing and to open up entirely new markets for this versatile technology.  There may soon be a day where 3D printed goods are everywhere you look and we hope to be a part of that vision.

Here is the Print a Thing philosophy:

“We want to change the world for the better through technology, and we see democratized 3D printing as one way to do it. When anyone can make completely unique physical objects at a reasonable price, without having the money or technical skills to own and operate a 3D printer of their own, a whole new creative energy will be released throughout the world. We built Print a Thing in the hopes that it would be a positive force for startups, do-it-yourselfers and creative spirits everywhere.”
